channel.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
channel.description:
Alright, I got a nice amount of money right now, but I need 900m-1b to buy what I want. The money making ideas if I tried them for 1b it would take awhile, and it will in general.
I've thought of scamming, dueling and hosting horse games etc. but if you guys have any ideas you'd like to share, i'll be open to them.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

You can be clever with your familiar. Find a green dragon bot and kill enough dragons to fill an inventory. Once you’ve done that drop bones/hide and quickly step one tile away so that your familiar is standing where the drop is. Bots will often/usually one click single items for detectability and such but if you time it right the bot should attack your familiar.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
item.dc:creator: @spankjava spank
item.description:
@spankjava wrote:

Ok this method is a longshot and requires money to start with and theres not exactly a chance they will sell on the GE
Corrupt Morrigan Javlins are: 27,300 coins

C. morrigan’s javelin § are: 41,500 coins

So you make 14,200 per javlin so lets do the maths

Say you start with 50m you buy 1831(roughly) they sometimes sell for cheaper on the GE.The cost for the weapon p should only cost you no more then 50k so 1831x41,500 coins = 76m roughly so nows the hard part you can sell them on the GE and wait a while for them to sell.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

Because if I do masks the more expensive the item is, the easier it is to get high resells. I made ~20m in green masks in less than 3 days over 4 sells. So… that’s why I do rares.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Why don’t you only sell ~50% of it then use the rest to flip until you return to the same amount again? That way you can repeatedly make cash instead of selling your self out and it taking years to get back to your previous riches.

I know you’re asking for new methods, but I’m just suggesting a few things for when you sell the money but yeah I think my above post pretty much says everything about getting there (that I would do anyway).

Though as I said, I don’t play RS and haven’t in years so can’t really put personal experience here

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

Thanks for responding guys, it’s not really a matter of how to do something, atm I flip small rares from green masks to red masks in price. It’s more of what else is there out there, or if someone has a better way of making money. What I want to buy, is Torva, because I don’t do much this time of year, then I can sell the money I made during the summer for ~$500. So, do keep posting responses as I am listening and taking note to everything you guys are saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making RSGP (READ)
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Careful Davidi2 may read this! (to late)

I haven’t played RS in a long time but can’t you look at the GE graphs and somehow predict when an item is going to rise and buy it before it does so, then sell it at an unreasonably high price in comparison to what you bought it for?

If you got the prediction correct you could make tons of profit with that amount of cash to work with.

Maybe this will help you:

Apparently this is good for minimum effort, and very profitable when done on a large scale! There are also a ton of money making methods above this thread http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,418861.0.html

Read full topic
